txt.en: You have been defeated in battle, and must retreat to a safe area to recover.  While recovering from defeat, you will be under the influence of Dread. While in this state you will have reduced morale, receive less benefit from morale restoration skills, and will suffer more damage to your morale when attacked.
You have been defeated in battle, and must choose to revive where you are or retreat to a safe area to recover. You may only revive every so often, so choose wisely.
